idea-plugin.name: FormatJSONForEntity
idea-plugin.description:
The purpose of this plugin is mainly to convert the current entity class into a JSON string.

Operation method: in the editor page of the java entity class, menu: code - generate - format the entity class into JSON

这个插件的用途主要是将当前实体类转化为JSON字符串。

操作方法：在java实体类的编辑器页面，菜单：代码 - 生成 - 格式化实体类成JSON
